name: svelto-demo
description: Demo website used during the development of Svelto for testing all the available components.

scripts.svelto:dev: npm run svelto:build:dev && npm run svelto:watch:dev
scripts.svelto:prod: npm run svelto:build:prod && npm run svelto:watch:prod
scripts.ghpage: npm run svelto:build:prod && npm run website:clean && npm run website:build
